name: Disorientation (TheJacob)
description:
Future of this game is unknown. That means project´s development can be stopped in any second. Development build doesn´t contain the end! Thank you for your attention.

You are a young man that has a head injury. The last place you remember is the hospital. The hospital was boring so you should sleep until you will go home.  Apparently, you just woke up in a strange alley. You didn´t know anything that happened. So you wanted to know everything about this "nightmare".
